actions.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment prohibits any funds under the Act from being used to reallocate Federal highway formula funding for the livable communities program unless the program is first authorized by Congress.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to prohibit any funds under the Act from being used to reallocate Federal highway formula funding for the livable communities program unless the program is first authorized by Congress.
